TITLE: Climate cash pours into election swing region. Will it help Harris?
SUMMARY: An area near Pittsburgh is being recast into a clean energy hub by IRA cash. It’s a test of whether climate policies can help Democrats beat Trump.

TITLE: US oil output notches fresh record in August
SUMMARY: U.S. oil production set an annual record peak in 2023 that is likely to be broken this year.

TITLE: How the landmark climate law hobbled Joe Manchin
SUMMARY: The Inflation Reduction Act is reaping benefits in his home state of West Virginia, but the senator is getting little love for his efforts.

TITLE: ‘No big plan B’: A global anti-Trump climate resistance struggles to gain ground
SUMMARY: Diplomats and activists from around the world are discussing ways to keep up the fight against global warming, even in the face of an absent or hostile U.S. administration.

TITLE: Harris, fracking and Shapiro: Dem campaign looks for Pennsylvania breakthrough
SUMMARY: Vice President Kamala Harris says she no longer wants to ban the drilling that's made Pennsylvania a natural gas powerhouse, but skeptics may need reassuring by the popular governor.

TITLE: Trump vs. Biden’s historic climate agenda
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden may no longer be on the 2024 ballot — but his legacy is. And former President Donald Trump would have multiple tools to thwart his ambitions on energy, infrastructure and climate change.

TITLE: Harris campaign pledges she won't ban fracking
SUMMARY: Kamala Harris' shift on fracking comes after GOP presidential nominee Donald Trump raised her 2019 stance calling for banning the oil and gas drilling technique.

TITLE: Sunday was Earth’s hottest day in all recorded history, climate agency says
SUMMARY: "As the climate keeps warming, we are bound to see new records being broken in future months and years.”

TITLE: House Republicans bail on another spending bill as their summer funding ambitions fizzle
SUMMARY: Anticipating failure, GOP leaders decided to skip a final passage vote Tuesday night of their measure to fund the Department of Energy and federal water infrastructure programs.

TITLE: Congress Trump-proofed this $27B climate program. Here’s why that’s a problem.
SUMMARY: EPA has until September to spend the money. But the agency is short on cash needed to avoid expensive mistakes.

TITLE: His boss thought he was on drugs. But he was dying of heatstroke.
SUMMARY: It took 50 years and skyrocketing temperatures before the government proposed heat protections for workers. The rules might never take effect.

TITLE: Big River: Can the Mississippi build America again?
SUMMARY: Biden hopes the same waterways that spurred westward expansion can cut greenhouse gas emissions. Environmentalists aren’t so sure.

TITLE: Biden announces heat rules as climate-related deaths rise
SUMMARY: The regulations would be the first federal rules to protect workers from dangerous temperatures. But Donald Trump might be president before they take effect.

TITLE: Federal judge blocks Biden’s pause on LNG export permits
SUMMARY: The decision to stay the LNG pause upends one of Joe Biden’s major policy nods to climate-focused activists who have accused the president of not doing enough to mitigate planet-warming emissions.

TITLE: Beryl strengthens into hurricane in Atlantic, forecast to become major storm
SUMMARY: “It’s astonishing to see a forecast for a major (Category 3+) hurricane in June anywhere in the Atlantic, let alone this far east in the deep tropics," one storm expert tweeted.

TITLE: Trump would withdraw US from Paris climate treaty again, campaign says
SUMMARY: The statement comes after years of conservatives laying the groundwork for Trump to withdraw from the global agreement intended to reduce emissions of the greenhouse gases causing climate change.

TITLE: US agency approves a giant natural gas export project — despite Biden’s pause
SUMMARY: The Louisiana project called CP2 would be one of the largest natural gas export terminals along the Gulf Coast.

TITLE: ‘Tough luck’: The Supreme Court just took a new bite out of Biden’s agencies’ powers
SUMMARY: The high court's ruling could hamper enforcement efforts at agencies across the federal government.

TITLE: Trump takes on the Pentagon's (nonexistent) electric tanks
SUMMARY: The Defense Department has spent years planning for global warming and its impact on national security.

TITLE: Flubbed climate test won't deter rich donors from altering the sky
SUMMARY: They funded a failed experiment to block the sun. They plan to try again.

TITLE: They're coming (with labels) for your gas stoves
SUMMARY: Environmental groups are backing bills in California, New York and Illinois to put labels on gas stoves warning of their health hazards.

TITLE: Trump rallies Republicans against Biden energy policies, but sidesteps the massive climate law
SUMMARY: Trump also criticized government mandates toward the purchase of electric vehicles during Thursday's address to GOP senators, echoing an often-repeated line on the campaign trail.

TITLE: FERC gives green light to start up Mountain Valley Pipeline
SUMMARY: The approval marks the end of a lengthy regulatory and legal battle over the pipeline.
